name: HangryHangryDragopillar
description:
Follow the journey of a "Drago-pillar" as it looks for food in preparation for it's ultimate evolution. The only way to move is to fling yourself.

Keyboard Controls - 'A' or 'D' to aim and 'Spacebar' to fling.
Joystick Controls - 'Left Stick' to aim and 'X' to fling.
